title: "Addenbrooke's Hospital unveils MRI scanner with AI"
excerpt: "A magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scanner which reduces time spent in the scanner and provides clearer images is being used for the first time in a UK hospital. The 3.0 tesla kit has been installed at Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge."
